bt.data

Interface DataDescriptor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable

    public interface DataDescriptor
extends Closeable
    Torrent's data descriptor. Provides access to individual chunks and status of torrent's data.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods

      Get the amount of data left to verify

      Get the set of pieces that only contain parts of the the set of files

      Check if the torrent was finished upon initial hashing

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • getChunkDescriptors

        List<ChunkDescriptor> getChunkDescriptors()
        Returns:
        List of chunks in the same order as they appear in torrent's metainfo. Hence, index of a chunk in this list can be used as the index of the corresponding piece in data exchange between peers.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getBitfield

        LocalBitfield getBitfield()
        Returns:
        Status of torrent's data.
        Since:
        1.0

      • getFilesForPiece

        @Deprecated
List<TorrentFile> getFilesForPiece(int pieceIndex)
        Deprecated. use getAllPiecesForFiles(Set) or getPiecesWithOnlyFiles(Set) instead
        Get a list of files that a given piece index intersects
        Returns:
        A list of files that a given piece index intersects
        Since:
        1.7

      • getAllPiecesForFiles

        BitSet getAllPiecesForFiles(Set<TorrentFile> files)
        Get all pieces that contain any part of the set of files
        Parameters:
        files - the files the pieces are needed for
        Returns:
        All pieces that contain any part of the passed in files
        Since:
        1.10

      • getPiecesWithOnlyFiles

        BitSet getPiecesWithOnlyFiles(Set<TorrentFile> files)
        Get the set of pieces that only contain parts of the the set of files
        Parameters:
        files - the files the pieces are needed for
        Returns:
        The set of pieces that only contain parts of the passed in files
        Since:
        1.10

      • getReader

        DataReader getReader()
        Get the data reader interface, which provides convenient ways to work with torrent's data (e.g. read it in a stream-like fashion).
        Returns:
        Data reader
        Since:
        1.8

      • waitForAllPieces

        void waitForAllPieces()
               throws InterruptedException
        Wait for all of the pieces of the torrent to download
        Throws:

      • startedAsSeed

        boolean startedAsSeed()
        Check if the torrent was finished upon initial hashing
        Returns:
        true if the torrent file was complete upon initial hashing
